mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORTED_CONTENT( ORIGINAL_SEQ, REPORTED_SORT, REPORTED_ID, REPORTED_DATE ) SELECT #{original_seq}, #{reported_sort}, #{reported_id}, NOW() FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT REPORT_SEQ FROM REPORTED_CONTENT WHERE ORIGINAL_SEQ = #{original_seq} AND REPORTED_ID = #{reported_id} ) LIMIT 1
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.REPORT_SEQ, A.ORIGINAL_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_VIEWS, COUNT(REPORT_SEQ) AS CNT FROM REPORTED_CONTENT A, BOARD B WHERE A.ORIGINAL_SEQ = B.BOARD_ID GROUP BY A.ORIGINAL_SEQ ) A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY A.CNT DESC
SELECT BOARD_ID , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_DATE , BOARD_VIEWS , BOARD_LIKE_IT , BOARD_CATEGORY , MEMBER_NUM FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = #{board_id}

SELECT A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.CATEGORY_DES, COALESCE(B.CNT,'0') AS CNT FROM REPORTED_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REPORTED_SORT, COUNT(REPORTED_SORT) AS CNT FROM REPORTED_CONTENT WHERE ORIGINAL_SEQ = #{board_id} GROUP BY REPORTED_SORT) B ON A.CATEGORY_NUM = B.REPORTED_SORT
